name: furkies-purrkies-poetry-0008
title: Make Me Young by Kurt Vonnegut Jr
html:
Here was what Kilgore Trout cried out to me in my father's voice:

"Make me young,

make me young,

make me young!"
bootstrap:
Here was what Kilgore Trout cried out to me in my father's voice:
"Make me young,
make me young,
make me young!"
